thread.title: How do parents really feel about data?
thread.title_full: How do parents really feel about data?

title: How do parents really feel about data?
text:
28 How do parents really feel about data? 
eSchool News: New data from the Future of Privacy Forum (FPF) reveals a majority of parents participating in a survey said they support using student data to inform educational practices, but they remain concerned about student data privacy and security issues in schools.
